articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: China's BYD opens EV factory in Thailand, first in Southeast Asia - CNBC
articles.description: China's BYD opened an electric vehicle plant in Thailand on Thursday, the automaker's first factory in Southeast Asia, a fast-growing regional EV market.
articles.content:
China's BYD opened an electric vehicle plant in Thailand on Thursday, the automaker's first factory in Southeast Asia, a fast-growing regional EV market where it has become the dominant player.
